LanguageData.NoPain.label: wielded painlessness
LanguageData.NoPain.description: Pain is disabled by the magical influence of the mana from a wielded weapon.
LanguageData.SpeedBoost.label: wielded speed
LanguageData.SpeedBoost.description: Movement is sped up by the magical influence of the mana from a wielded weapon.
LanguageData.HungerMaker.label: wielded hunger
LanguageData.HungerMaker.description: Hunger is increased by the magical influence of the mana from a bonded weapon.
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.label: wielded arcane load sink
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.description: Neural heat dissipation is improved by the magical influence of the mana from a bonded weapon.
